reviews.text: We stayed here one night while visiting family in Kirkwood. The property is ideally located next to some great shopping and eating places. The pool was well maintained and clean, as was the property. The staff was friendly and the room was clean. My only suggestion is that the mattress in our room needed replacing-
reviews.title: Clean, affordable and great location

reviews.text: Would recommend this hotel for anyone looking for a great value and location!
reviews.title: Convenient, friendly, and no-nonsense

reviews.text: The Best Western Kirkwood Inn in a great property if you are looking for something convenient off the highway but don't want to travel all the way into St. Louis. The check-in process was extremely easy and took about 30 seconds. Basically the clerk got my information, gave me keys, and directed me to where my room was and how best to enter with my stuff. That's how you check someone in!
reviews.title: Back again....

reviews.text: The room itself was comfortable and well-appointed, but the cleanliness was somewhat lacking. There were hairs stuck to the bathroom walls and inside the tub from previous guests. I know it's difficult to grab all those things for the overworked housekeepers that have to clean a certain number of rooms per shift, but it is kind of gross to see nevertheless. We also spotted a cockroach inside the closet that ran into a hole in the wall before we could kill it. Again, probably a very difficult thing for the hotel to control considering how damp and rainy the area is. I didn't say anything to the hotel staff but I'm sure they would have moved me if I asked.
reviews.title: Exceptional Service and Value

reviews.text: The free breakfast is a great start to your morning--take advantage of it! Get there early and beat the crowd.
reviews.title: Wow...

reviews.text: This hotel was about 20km out of St. Louis in a nice suburb with heaps of shops and restaurants.
reviews.title: Nice hotel with large rooms, great breakfast. Recommended

reviews.text: there is really nothing in St. Louis City besides the Arch which is a must and the paddleboat ride on
reviews.title: Clean

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: the Mississippi so it was great to be located where we were. Definitely recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Best Western Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Lovely large, clean rooms and good facilities.
reviews.title: Impressive

reviews.text: Clean & comfortable. Close proximity to eateries & shops. Not very spacious but okay for a nights stay. The complimentary breakfast was average and the Chili's restaurant was connected to the hotel. We ate at the Texas Roadhouse restaurant nearby which was a great value & very family friendly.
reviews.title: Good value, friendly service, clean and spacious rooms
No frills no fuss no ripoff
reviews.text: Up to the BW standard that we wnjoyed now for 3nights.

reviews.title: Great stay at Best Western Kirkwood
reviews.text: Its the macdonalds of motels.
You know what standards you will get ....clean , good beds...homely feel.
reviews.title: Everything went great until sourpus at checkout.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Dont forget to ask for seniors discount if over 55
reviews.title: Very Good Hotel.

reviews.text: The price was quite reasonable - especially the online price. The hotel was well located because of it's nearness to my family. The staff was great even though I barely spent time there. And, the room was nicely decorated and very clean. Outside noises could not be heard. There's an onsite restaurant and breakfast is included.
reviews.title: Best Western Kirkwood Inn
do not pass this one by.
reviews.text: I stayed here for a business trip, and i will stay here when i am back in the area. extremely clean hotel, and very friendly staff. there is a chilis restaurant attached which saves you from having to leave, and you get discount coupons when you check in. i did not try the pool but it was very well kept, and clean.

The staff is very helpful. The hotel even gives you detailed directions to major attractions in the St Louis area. They provide breakfast and offer a 10% discount to Chili's inside the hotel, and 10% off to the nearby Texas Roadhouse.
reviews.title: Good Hotel

reviews.text: Stayed here on a family trek from CA to MA. Awesome customer service. Great place for those with a special needs child - incredibly accommodating with a ground floor room on end of hall so we wouldn't have to trek through busy lobby. Chili's restaurant accessed from 2nd floor (has elevators) and breakfast room on 2nd floor as well. Didn't bother us because our child eats in the room. Nice pool, but was a little cool for us by the time we got there (7pm), and towels were all gone. Front desk took care of the towels quickly. Comfortable beds, very clean rooms, great staff - came and deodorized the room someone had smoked in. Half a block off 44 and surrounded by restaurant choices, Target, and WalMart for emergency items. Hotel also has coin guest laundry - a must for family traveling for 5 days!
reviews.title: Wonderful Customer Service

reviews.text: Very Nice clean Hotel. for sure worth the money. Close by lots of family activities. Very Friendly staff. Clean. Pool very Nice. We witnessed staff cleaning the pool daily. Which was nice. Walmart within walking distance.
reviews.title: Very Nice Clean Hotel

reviews.text: We recently stayed at the BW-Kirkwood Inn for a brief mini-cation. Very happy with the quality of our experience from check in to check out. The hotel staff was excellent and our room on the first floor was spacious, clean, well equipped, and very quiet. We had several problems with dirty water backing up in the tub and sink, which was immediately addressed by hotel staff. The hotel breakfast was rather ordinary, but the connected Chili's Restaurant provided several tasty meals. Location is excellent, parking is plentiful and the hotel is close to a number of great attractions, shopping and restaurants. We'll be staying here again.
reviews.title: Excellent Experience
